name: Introduction to Sociology
description: This course is an introduction to the field of sociology, including the history and evolution of the discipline, its primary theories and methods, and its applications in a variety of settings.

name: Methods of Social Research
description: This course provides an introduction to the basic principles and methods of social research, including survey design, quantitative and qualitative methods, sampling, and data analysis.

name: Sociology of Culture
description: This course examines the sociological aspects of culture, including the role of culture in everyday life, the interrelationships between culture and social structure, and the impact of social movements, power, and technology on culture.
